meta.title: BouncyFeet! Learn Shuffle Dance the Fun Way.

home.title: Bouncy Feet!
home.description0: Welcome to the dance app Bouncy Feet. The app supports you in your shuffle dance journey.
home.description1: Place your phone so that the camera can see your whole body while you dance. Then record your dance session, and the app will try to detect the steps.
home.description2: This is an early, pre-alpha version of Bouncy Feet. The content is very limited and unpolished. If you run into issues with the app, please open an issue on GitHub.

record.title: Dance
record.description: Bring your own music and then record yourself while dancing.

settings.title: Settings
settings.double-speed: Also dance to the offbeat (double speed)
